blogs.title: DevFest Kenya
blogs.body:
GDG DevFest Kenya is a community organized conference with 2000 amazing engineers.carefully selected tech talks, the best industry experts presenting on the exciting topics and a world-class conference experience.
                    Be a part of this unique community moment in 2020, and join the fully virtual DevFest movement happening over one epic weekend.Want to Speak at #DevFestKenya  #DevFestNairobi? Submit C4P here.The pilgrimage is a time honored tradition
blogs.author: Ngesa
